basic_node.title: Thickness of object part material
basic_node.description: Thickness of object part material considered being the length of the path in normal direction of the tangential plane through the object part material.
basic_node.references: [sp48, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-642-10523-4, p.93.] [sp46, https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acsami.9b11816] [sp47, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp47, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271612000378, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp47, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-12352-3_18, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two. See p.415.]
